Cherry

Description

Cherry is a social-networking platform that helps people connect, participate in events, and join communitiesâ€”similar to Meetup.com. I engineered scalable RESTful API endpoints for user management, event creation, and real-time interactions using a modern full-stack tech stack.

You can check out the project on GitHub.

Technologies Used
